member.name: T:Penguin.Email.Templating.Abstractions.Interfaces.IEmailTemplate
member.summary: Represents a template used for generating email messages

member.name: P:Penguin.Email.Templating.Abstractions.Interfaces.IEmailTemplate.Enabled
member.summary: Whether or not this template is currently enabled

member.name: T:Penguin.Email.Templating.Abstractions.Interfaces.IEmailTemplateRenderer
member.summary: An interface used for classes intended to render out email templates into HTML

member.name: M:Penguin.Email.Templating.Abstractions.Interfaces.IEmailTemplateRenderer.RenderEmail(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Penguin.Templating.Abstractions.TemplateParameter},Penguin.Email.Templating.Abstractions.Interfaces.IEmailTemplate,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Takes information required by the email template and attempts to return bound HTML representing the provided field
member.param: A collection of object names and values to be passed into the template
The template to use for generation
The field/property on the email template that this call is binding (in case its not the body)
